cab.content: This document is the property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.607.BHDSECRET.CP.4000THE CABINET.DRAFT DESPATCH TO LORD HARDINGE.MEMORANDUM BY THE SECRETARY OF STATE FOR WAR.0In my opinion, the draft despatch to Lord Hardinge, circulated to the Cabinet as 1^1 CP. 3902 by the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs on 24th May, should be amended Reparation by the omission on page 8 of the nine lines in paragraph 13 beginning 14il If the French Government really consider . . ."and ending " . . . have hitherto confidently relied ; and "L. W.-E.The War Office,27th May, 1922.(B2SJ/163) 100 6/22 W.O.P. 96
